detaileddescription.para: Enables the clock for and resets the given device.

briefdescription.para: Initialize and reset all available GPIO devices.
Set the mode of a GPIO pin.

parameterdescription.para: Pin on the device whose mode to set, 0--15.
General purpose or alternate function mode to set the pin to.

briefdescription.para: Initialize the AFIO clock, and reset the AFIO registers.
Select a source input for an external interrupt.

parameterdescription.para: Port which contains pin to use as source input.
